item.title: Ractf 2021 - Dodgy Database
item.description: The challenge was a part of the Really Awesome CTF 2021 and it can be viewed on ctftime.org. Basically we are provided with a executable and its source code. Upon reading the source code we see that there is a ‘GOD’ role and if we are able to acquire that GOD role, the program prints the flag. The only way to input data is from stdin, where the challenge prompts for a new user to be created.
